verses.verse: The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi;<s%> <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> and <S%H4847>Merari.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath;<s%> <S%H6019>Amram,<s%> <S%H3324>Izhar,<s%> and <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H5816>Uzziel.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6019>Amram;<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H4813>Miriam.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> also of <S%H175>Aaron;<s%> <S%H5070>Nadab,<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar.<s%>
Eleazar <S%H499><s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6372>Phinehas,<s%> <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H50>Abishua,<s%>
And <S%H50>Abishua<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1231>Bukki,<s%> and <S%H1231>Bukki<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5813>Uzzi,<s%>
And <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2228>Zerahiah,<s%> and <S%H2228>Zerahiah<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4812>Meraioth,<s%>
Meraioth <S%H4812><s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H568>Amariah,<s%> and <S%H568>Amariah<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H285>Ahitub,<s%>
And <S%H285>Ahitub<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H290>Ahimaaz,<s%>
And <S%H290>Ahimaaz<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%> and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3110>Johanan,<s%>

And <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%> <S%H1931>(he<s%> it is <S%H834>that<s%> executed the priest's <S%H3547>office<s%> in the <S%H1004>temple<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> in Jerusalem: <S%H3389>)<s%>
And <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H568>Amariah,<s%> and <S%H568>Amariah<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H285>Ahitub,<s%>
And <S%H285>Ahitub<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7967>Shallum,<s%>
And <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%> and <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%>
And <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8304>Seraiah,<s%> and <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3087>Jehozadak,<s%>

And <S%H3087>Jehozadak<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> into captivity, when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> carried <S%H1540>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi;<s%> <S%H1648>Gershom,<s%> <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> and <S%H4847>Merari.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> be the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershom;<s%> <S%H3845>Libni,<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> were, <S%H6019>Amram,<s%> and <S%H3324>Izhar,<s%> and <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H5816>Uzziel.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari;<s%> <S%H4249>Mahli,<s%> and <S%H4187>Mushi.<s%> And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> according to their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>
Of <S%H1648>Gershom;<s%> <S%H3845>Libni<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3189>Jahath<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H2155>Zimmah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
Joah <S%H3098><s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5714>Iddo<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H2979>Jeaterai<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath;<s%> <S%H5992>Amminadab<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7141>Korah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H617>Assir<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
Elkanah <S%H511><s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H43>Ebiasaph<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H617>Assir<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
Tahath <S%H8480><s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H222>Uriel<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H511>Elkanah;<s%> <S%H6022>Amasai,<s%> and <S%H287>Ahimoth.<s%>
As for <S%H511>Elkanah:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H511>Elkanah;<s%> <S%H6689>Zophai<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H5184>Nahath<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
Eliab <S%H446><s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3395>Jeroham<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel;<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H2059>Vashni,<s%> and <S%H29>Abiah.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari;<s%> <S%H4249>Mahli,<s%> <S%H3845>Libni<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5798>Uzza<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
Shimea <S%H8092><s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H2293>Haggiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are they <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5975>set<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3027>service<s%> of <S%H7892>song<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> after that the <S%H4480>ark<s%> <S%H727><s%> had <S%H4480>rest.<s%> <S%H4494><s%>

And they <S%H1961>ministered<s%> <S%H8334><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the dwelling <S%H4908>place<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> with <S%H7892>singing,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and then they <S%H5975>waited<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> their <S%H5656>office<s%> according to their <S%H4941>order.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are they that <S%H5975>waited<s%> with their <S%H1121>children.<s%> Of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites:<s%> <S%H1968>Heman<s%> a <S%H7891>singer,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3100>Joel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8050>Shemuel,<s%>
The <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H511>Elkanah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H447>Eliel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8430>Toah,<s%>
The <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6689>Zuph,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H511>Elkanah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4287>Mahath,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6022>Amasai,<s%>
The <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H511>Elkanah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3100>Joel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6846>Zephaniah,<s%>
The <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8480>Tahath,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H617>Assir,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H43>Ebiasaph,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%>
The <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3324>Izhar,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> who <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> even <S%H623>Asaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berachiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8092>Shimea,<s%>
The <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4317>Michael,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1202>Baaseiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4441>Malchiah,<s%>
The <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H867>Ethni,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5718>Adaiah,<s%>
The <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H387>Ethan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2155>Zimmah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%>
The <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3189>Jahath,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershom,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>

And their <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> stood <S%H5921>on<s%> the left <S%H8040>hand:<s%> <S%H387>Ethan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7029>Kishi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5660>Abdi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4409>Malluch,<s%>
The <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H558>Amaziah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%>
The <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H557>Amzi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1137>Bani,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8106>Shamer,<s%>
The <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4249>Mahli,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4187>Mushi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>

Their <S%H251>brethren<s%> also the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were <S%H5414>appointed<s%> unto all <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

But <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H6999>offered<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense,<s%> and were appointed for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the place most <S%H6944>holy,<s%> <S%H6944><s%> and to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron;<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H50>Abishua<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
Bukki <S%H1231><s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H2228>Zerahiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
Meraioth <S%H4812><s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H568>Amariah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H285>Ahitub<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
Zadok <S%H6659><s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H290>Ahimaaz<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are their dwelling <S%H4186>places<s%> throughout their <S%H2918>castles<s%> in their <S%H1366>coasts,<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> theirs <S%H1961>was<s%> the <S%H1486>lot.<s%>
And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%> it.
But the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and the <S%H2691>villages<s%> thereof, they <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh.<s%>

And to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> they <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H853>namely,<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> the city of <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> and <S%H3841>Libnah<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H3492>Jattir,<s%> and <S%H851>Eshtemoa,<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
And <S%H2432>Hilen<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1688>Debir<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
And <S%H6228>Ashan<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%> with her suburbs: <S%H4054><s%>

And out of the <S%H4480>tribe<s%> <S%H4294><s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin;<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1387>Geba<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H5964>Alemeth<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> their <S%H5892>cities<s%> throughout their <S%H4940>families<s%> were <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> which were <S%H3498>left<s%> of the <S%H4480>family<s%> <S%H4940><s%> of that <S%H4294>tribe,<s%> were cities given out of the <S%H4480>half<s%> <S%H2677><s%> <S%H4294>tribe,<s%> namely, out of the <S%H4276>half<s%> tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> by <S%H1486>lot,<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershom<s%> throughout their <S%H4940>families<s%> out of the <S%H4480>tribe<s%> <S%H4294><s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> and out of the <S%H4480>tribe<s%> <S%H4294><s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> and out of the <S%H4480>tribe<s%> <S%H4294><s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> and out of the <S%H4480>tribe<s%> <S%H4294><s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

Unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> were given by <S%H1486>lot,<s%> throughout their <S%H4940>families,<s%> out of the <S%H4480>tribe<s%> <S%H4294><s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and out of the <S%H4480>tribe<s%> <S%H4294><s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and out of the <S%H4480>tribe<s%> <S%H4294><s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H853>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs.<s%>

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> out of the <S%H4480>tribe<s%> <S%H4294><s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and out of the <S%H4480>tribe<s%> <S%H4294><s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> and out of the <S%H4480>tribe<s%> <S%H4294><s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H7121>called<s%> by their <S%H8034>names.<s%>
